issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
h6. Issue Description

After click on run project, the project take too much time trying to run dexer :

And after that the project crashes and never finish the build. 

h6. Steps to reproduce

# create a new alloy project
# run for android 6

** appc Info Attached
** crashlog Attached
fields.environment:
Name                        = Mac OS X
  Version                     = 10.11.5
Appcelerator CLI
  Installer                   = 4.2.6
  Core Package                = 5.3.0

Titanium CLI
  CLI Version                 = 5.0.8
  node-appc Version           = 0.2.31

NODE
  Node.js Version             = 4.4.5
  npm Version                 = 2.15.5

Titanium SDK  5.3.0.GA

comments.body:
I am not able to reproduce this issue using the current GA components. Tried using the same android build tools version as the reporter but still issue is not reproducible.
Used java version "1.8.0_73"

Looks like an environment issue. In particular, the Java used.
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/18794573/objc10012-class-javalaunchhelper-is-implemented-in-both-libinstrument-dyl
http://bugs.java.com/bugdatabase/view_bug.do?bug_id=8021205

Could they try JDK 7 and see if it solves their issue?
